questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Traffic incident

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) On a paved road
C) Inside a museum
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A car and a truck being carried 
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A group of people
B) An animal
C) Vehicles
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A truck and car being carried by another truck
C) A bicycle
D) A house

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A pedestrian
B) A white car
C) A signpost
D) A park bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A shipping container, another car, fence and trees
C) A lake
D) A playground

What type of vehicle is on the flatbed truck?
A) A motorcycle
B) A bicycle
C) A GMC pickup truck
D) A boat

What is the color of the car in the foreground?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) White
D) Black

What is the relationship between the flatbed truck and the white car?
A) The white car is towing the flatbed truck
B) The flatbed truck is towing the white car
C) The white car is parked next to the flatbed truck
D) The flatbed truck is parked on top of the white car

What brand is the car in the foreground?
A) BMW
B) Cadillac
C) Toyota
D) Ford

What can be seen on the left side of the photo?
A) A pedestrian crossing
B) A red car
C) A bicycle lane
D) A park bench

What is the color of the truck in the center?
A) Black
B) Blue
C) White
D) Green

What kind of vehicle is carrying the GMC truck?
A) A flatbed truck
B) A tow truck
C) A pickup truck
D) A sedan

What is the color of the shipping container in the background?
A) Yellow
B) Red
C) Green
D) Brown

What is the primary focus of the photo?
A) The landscape
B) The traffic incident
C) The buildings
D) The people

What is the position of the white car relative to the flatbed truck?
A) In front of it
B) Behind it
C) Underneath it
D) On top of it

What is the make of the pickup truck on the flatbed?
A) Ford
B) GMC
C) Chevrolet
D) Dodge

What is the likely state of traffic in the photo?
A) Flowing smoothly
B) At a standstill
C) Light traffic
D) Pedestrian traffic only

What is the primary color theme of the vehicles in the photo?
A) Black and white
B) Red and blue
C) White and red
D) Green and yellow

What is the road surface made of?
A) Gravel
B) Concrete
C) Asphalt
D) Dirt

What is the orientation of the white car in relation to the road?
A) Perpendicular
B) Parallel
C) Diagonal
D) Slightly tilted with front tires on road and back tires elevated

What is visible in the background besides the shipping container?
A) Trees and a fence
B) A river and a bridge
C) A mountain and a lake
D) A building and a park

What is the state of the white car’s front end?
A) Intact
B) Crumpled
C) Missing
D) Covered in mud

What is the position of the flatbed truck’s cabin?
A) Facing away from the camera
B) Facing towards the camera
C) Not visible
D) Facing sideways

What is the condition of the road?
A) Wet
B) Dry
C) Icy
D) Snow-covered

What is the position of the white car’s front wheels?
A) On the road
B) In the air
C) On the flatbed
D) In a ditch

What is the probable reason for the flatbed truck’s presence?
A) Towing the white car
B) Delivering goods
C) Carrying passengers
D) Transporting the GMC truck and a car

What is the color of the flatbed truck?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) White
D) Black

What is the likely function of the flatbed truck?
A) Passenger transport
B) Goods delivery
C) Vehicle transport
D) Emergency services

What is the likely condition of the GMC truck?
A) Damaged
B) Intact
C) Missing parts
D) Covered in mud

What is the position of the shipping container in relation to the flatbed truck?
A) In front of it
B) Behind it
C) On top of it
D) Beside it

What is the state of the road markings?
A) Faded
B) Clear
C) Missing
D) Covered

What is the state of the white car’s headlights?
A) Intact
B) Broken
C) Missing
D) Covered

What is the state of the flatbed truck’s tires?
A) Intact
B) Flat
C) Missing
D) Covered in mud

What is the state of the shipping container?
A) Intact
B) Damaged
C) Missing parts
D) Covered in graffiti

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) The white Cadillac is being towed by the flatbed tow truck
B) The truck is being loaded with furniture
C) The vehicles are parked in a parking lot
D) The photo shows a peaceful park scene

How many vehicles are visible in the main focus of the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four
